WITH V_RESULT as(select SUB_ID from (select SUB_ID, row_number() over(partition by SUB_ID order by CREATED_TIME desc) as num from DB_SUB_DOC_TRACKING where 1=1
and RECEIVER_ID = #{loginUserId} ) where num =1)
select * from DB_SUB_DOC_INFO a inner join v_result b on a.ID = b.SUB_ID
left join DB_DOCUMENT_INFO c on a.INFO_ID=c.ID
left join (select SUB_ID,RECEIVER_NAME as deal_user_name from (select SUB_ID,RECEIVER_NAME,row_number() over(partition by SUB_ID order by CREATED_TIME desc) as num from DB_SUB_DOC_TRACKING) where num=1) f on a.id=f.sub_id
left join (
select s.INFO_ID,s.USER_NAME as leader_name,s.LEADER_COMMENT as leader_content,s.CREATED_TIME as leader_time, row_number() over(partition by s.info_id order by g.sort asc) as dNum from DB_DOCUMENT_SZPS s inner join DB_ROLE_SET g on s.USER_NAME=g.USER_NAME order by g.sort asc ) d on c.id = d.info_id
left join (select distinct info_id,listagg(sub_dept_name || nvl2(undertaker_name,'/' || undertaker_name || nvl2(undertaker_phone,'('||undertaker_phone||')',null),null), ',') within group(order by created_time desc) over(partition by info_id) under_depts from DB_SUB_DOC_INFO) h on a.INFO_ID = h.info_id
left join (select SUB_ID,RECEIVER_NAME deal_user_name,1 as receiver_is_me from(select SUB_ID,RECEIVER_ID,RECEIVER_NAME,DOC_STATUS,row_number() over(partition by SUB_ID order by m.CREATED_TIME desc) as num from DB_SUB_DOC_TRACKING m left join DB_SUB_DOC_INFO n on m.SUB_ID = n.ID) where 1=1
and RECEIVER_ID = #{loginUserId} and num = 1 and DOC_STATUS < 10)as e on a.ID = e.SUB_ID where 1=1
and c.DOC_TITLE like '%'||#{search}||'%'
and a.DOC_STATUS = #{docStatus}
and c.CUIBAN_FLAG ='1'
and e.receiver_is_me = 1
and c.STATUS=1 and (dNum = 1 or dNum is null) order by e.receiver_is_me nulls last, a.DOC_STATUS, a.CREATED_TIME desc
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
